page.description: Specify the alignment of the button bar.

discussion.p: The button bar for the Alphabet Search buttons is rendered at the top of the Grid component. The buttons can be can be aligned at the top of the Grid in the following locations:

item.name: Left
item.description: Buttons are aligned to the left edge of the grid.

item.name: Center
item.description: Buttons are centered at the top of the grid.

item.name: Right
item.description: Buttons are aligned to the right edge of the grid.

section.title: Localizing Applications
section.description: Some languages are read right-to-left. To modify the button bar to support right-to-left languages, such as Hebrew, set the *[ui:Alignment]* property to 'Right'.
